Submissions from admitted non-governmental organizations Background paper (192 kB) Report on the expert meeting International Institute for Sustainable Development - IISD coverage of the meeting   Final agenda (147 kB) Ways and means to improve availability and access to relevant information, including information on costs and benefits, as well as its better integration into impact and vulnerability assessments Needs, gaps, barriers and constraints Existing approaches and available data Introduction and overview    The SBSTA requested the secretariat to organize, under the guidance of the Chair of SBSTA, an expert meeting, before its twenty-eighth session, on ways and means to improve the integration of socio-economic information into impact and vulnerability assessments, including as they relate to adaptation planning.  The SBSTA requested the secretariat
